actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to revise the criteria for designation as a critical access hospital.

summary.text: Rural Hospital Flexibility Act of 1999 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the criteria for designation as a critical access hospital to: (1) modify the 96-hour restriction on acute care to an average of 96 hours; and (2) repeal the requirement of subjecting requests for waiver of the 96-hour restriction on a case-by-case basis to a peer review organization or equivalent entity.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to revise the criteria for designation as a critical access hospital.
